title: The Spirit 1987 TV Movie Sam Jones Nana Vistor
description:
Will Eisner's famed comic book hero makes his live-action debut in this rarely seen TV adaptation. 

When Detective Denny Colt, one of the finest, upstanding, incorruptible cops around, survives an assassination attempt by criminals, he is still believed by the public to be dead. He decides to use to his advantage, since being "dead", he isn't subject to the rules that bind regular cops. He grabs a fedora, straightens his red tie, puts on a mask and vows to continue to fight crime. The criminals of Central City better watch out for The Spirit! 

Written by Steven E. de Souza (48 Hrs, Die Hard) and starring Sam Jones (Flash Gordon) and Nana Vistor (Star Trek: Deep Space Nine) this adaptation remains more faithful to Eisner's character than the 2008 movie. This TV film was meant to act as a pilot for TV series on ABC but was never picked up

parsed.dn: The Spirit 1987 TV Movie Sam Jones Nana Vistor
parsed.name: The Spirit 1987 TV Movie Sam Jones Nana Vistor
